verses.name: Genesis 25:29
verses.text: And Jacob sod pottage: and Esau came from the field, and he was faint:

verses.name: Genesis 25:30
verses.text: And Esau said to Jacob, Feed me, I pray thee, with that same red pottage; for I am faint: therefore was his name called Edom.

verses.name: Genesis 25:31
verses.text: And Jacob said, Sell me this day thy birthright.

verses.name: Genesis 25:32
verses.text: And Esau said, Behold, I am at the point to die: and what profit shall this birthright do to me?

verses.name: Genesis 25:33
verses.text: And Jacob said, Swear to me this day; and he sware unto him: and he sold his birthright unto Jacob.
